title: Bueng Pai Farm Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fresh brewed coffee, 20 varieties of tea, fresh squeezed juice, shakes and smoothies, muesli, banana or chocolate pancakes, western and Thai food. Uses organically grown vegetable. Most meals are vegetarian but they also add meat (chicken) if requested.
